title: No icon shown with loot and I cant do anything with the loot
body: Yeah for a few days I notice in the new client that the loot icons are blank and you cant make it a permanent skin or even do rental this also affects the mastery tokens

replies.body:
Hey! 

Are you still having this issue with the new patch?

Its all fixed thanks man
